mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attach ( atch_no, atch_parent_no, atch_file_name, atch_original_name, atch_file_size, atch_fancy_size, atch_content_type, atch_path ) VALUES ( seq_attach.nextval, #{atchParentNo}, #{atchFileName}, #{atchOriginalName}, #{atchFileSize}, #{atchFancySize}, #{atchContentType}, #{atchPath} )
mapper.select: SELECT atch_no, atch_parent_no, atch_file_name, atch_original_name, atch_file_size, atch_fancy_size, atch_content_type, atch_path, atch_del_yn, atch_reg_date FROM attach
